original_text: Do I mean then that food sacrificed to an idol is anything, or that an idol is anything?
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 무엇을 말하느냐 우상의 제물은 무엇이며 우상은 무엇이냐

sentences.original_text: Do I mean then that food sacrificed to an idol is anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 우상에게 바친 음식이 무엇이라고 말하는가

sentences.original_text: or that an idol is anything?
